Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.client

Main public types for ClusterMate client module; most important of which is NetworkClient that is the object application code uses to access data in the logical distributed Store.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClusterServerNode
    Representation of a server node that is part of a cluster, including read-only accessors to state.
    EntryAccessors<K extends EntryKey>
    "Factory interface" that contains factory methods needed for constructing accessors for CRUD operations on stored entries.
    ServerNode
    Minimal information about a server node; information that must be accessible for per-call (single-node) requests and responses.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CallFailure
    Container for details of a single failed call to a server.
    ClusterViewByClient<K extends EntryKey>  
    Loggable
    Base class defined just to allow overriding logging of warning messages, should someone deeply care
    NetworkClient<K extends EntryKey>
    Factory abstraction used to separate details of physical network Client, and logical functionality needed by higher-level client implementation.
    NodeFailure
    Class that contains information about failure of an operation as it relates to call(s) to a single server node.
    NodesForKey
    Container class for an ordered set of references to server nodes that should be contacted for accessing content for given key, based on key hash based matching.
    StoreClient<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>,L extends ListItem>
    Client used for accessing temporary store service.
    StoreClientBootstrapper<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>,STORE extends StoreClient<K,CONFIG,?>,BOOTSTRAPPER extends StoreClientBootstrapper<K,CONFIG,STORE,BOOTSTRAPPER>>
    Helper class used for constructing and initializing a StoreClient instance.
    StoreClientConfig<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>>
    Base class for configuration types used with StoreClient implementations.
    StoreClientConfigBuilder<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>,BUILDER extends StoreClientConfigBuilder<K,CONFIG,BUILDER>>
    Base class for builder class for creating immutable StoreClientConfig instances.

Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.client Description

Main public types for ClusterMate client module; most important of which is NetworkClient that is the object application code uses to access data in the logical distributed Store.
